title: THESE Altcoins Turning Bullish Right Now! [Urgent Signal Triggered]
transcript:
Banter Fam, happy Monday to you all. New start 
of the week, new weekly candle closes, giving us   a little bit of insight. If I look at the last 
weekly close, it did show that this week would   start off red, but it is showing us we should 
start off quite aggressively to the green side   at the end of the week. There are a couple of 
big things that I want to show you guys today.   Momentum is starting to change, specifically 
midterm on a lot of altcoins. I want to show   you guys the key tools to see which altcoins 
are stronger than the rest right now. I want   to paint this picture for you that we are starting 
to shift the tides. The bear is starting to slowly   run out and we are starting to get really strong 
indicators to show that over the next couple of   weeks we are going to see some upside within the 
markets. We can then take that information and   strategize where we are putting our money. What 
amount of money are we going to be trading where?   What are we leaving for the midterm? What are we 
leaving for the long term? What bots are we using?   It is so important for you to have structure 
and understanding of what is strong and where   we are right now. I think the big question has 
been, are the tides turning? I am here to show   you guys today that I am seeing on specifically 
10 to 20 good altcoins that we are starting to   get bullish momentum back into the market. So 
guys, happy Monday to you all. Missed you all.   Last show was on Saturday. New week, new start. 
Let's get a game plan. Let's go. I try and help   everyone in my space and this is what I get. I try 
and fight the devils, but inside I am just like,   yes, squad, how are we all doing? Hope you have 
had a great weekend and are nice and recharged.   Now let's start going through a plan for the week. 
First, I want to start by making sure that you are   seeing opportunities when they are coming. It 
is very important when things are starting to   turn. Even though we are still seeing a little 
bit of chop within the markets, we saw some   strength come in and I think the question is, was 
that strength enough to break structure? If so,   when you see redness like we are seeing at 
the start of this week, this is activation   redness. This is confidence. I am building on 
this current pullback. Was the pump enough on   whatever altcoin you are paying attention to? Was 
it enough to break structure? If it was enough to   break structure, it is very important to have 
the confidence to enter the trades. It is very   important to get on the horse and look at the 
best strategy you can use. You have learned   from the past. There have been times this market 
has taken money and given money in the last year.   You need to activate on this pullback. You cannot 
allow past fear to slow you down. Today is a   starting point of you getting back on the horse 
and having confidence behind your trades. For me,   I will always have bad and good streaks. But 
one thing that will never die with me is I   know that my wins are bigger than my losses. 
The confidence is what really drives me to   get back my money or to get way ahead. It is not 
about being perfect or winning more than losing,   but confidence is a big thing. I want you to 
go recap your career in crypto. Look at where   you went right, where you went wrong, and what 
worked really well for you in the past. I want   you to play your strengths. May this be only spot 
trading, leverage trading, investing, or bots. The   key this year is to play your strengths. When 
it comes to experimentals, play them with one   or two percent of the capital. When you can sit 
on a red day and enter trades with confidence,   that is when you know you are comfortable with 
that strategy. The big mistake many traders make   is going too big into a new narrative too quickly. 
There is a cycle to everything. If I learn   something on two percent and then activate thirty 
percent of my account four months later, you are   setting up good fundamentals. If you are desperate 
to make money back, play your strengths. Are you   really good at leverage right now or are you 
really good at spot trades? What is your number   one A-game? Make sure seventy percent of your 
time right now is playing A and B because it is   conservative time. It is time to not lose anymore. 
Keep growing, but grow with ten to twenty percent.   As this market starts to break structures and move 
up again, those plan B, C, and D strategies will   be used. Let's jump into what is happening right 
now. Can I get some likes? I am going to give away   five Bitfunded accounts today. Get the likes up. I 
will choose them in the stream. Get yourself into   a routine on a Monday. I want to look at things 
on a high time frame. Look at where we closed on   Bitcoin price. We closed with a red candle. The 
reason why there is a start of redness right now   is this wick. We had some strength but ultimately 
closed red and left a wick, which means liquidity   is sitting lower down. That is why the market 
wants to come down and capture liquidity. Have   we broken structure to say that it is a big 
week of redness ahead? If I look at that, we   have not broken structure. We are actually coming 
into support. In a bullish scenario, the market   will come down, pull this liquidity, and we will 
see growth to the upside. An accelerated amount   of growth happens when we break that trend to the 
upside. Right now, the market is starting to slow   down its range. Bitcoin altcoins range is a little 
bit bigger. I am always confident in support   buys. I am not confident in resistance buys. When 
Bitcoin was at 94,000 or 93,000, I was not buying   because that is straight into resistance. I am 
confident when we hit support. Redness is actually   very good and greenness is actually very bad 
for entries. The moment we start to switch those   two things around, you start to find success. We 
have been taught to chase things that are green,   but then we are always late to the party. The 
people who made all the money were fishing in   the red previously. You do not want to arrive 
when the club is about to close. The best time   is to get there early and be part of the party 
as it is rallying. The only way you get in early   is to fish when not many are fishing. As it stands 
now, have we broken any structure to the downside?   No. My bottom trend line validates that. RSI has 
been sitting at the bottom and we are about to   exit. Every time we have exited, we have sped up. 
Bitcoin has been oversold on the weekly since the   first week of September 2025. We are sitting at 
four or five months of the market being oversold.   The bulls do come back into play and buying power 
does return. The bears are arrogant. They are   certain Bitcoin is going down to 50,000 dollars. 
We all know what happens to arrogance in this   space. Tides turn and tides wipe people out. Where 
is max pain right now? What will catch the market   most off guard? Most people think 70,000 dollars 
is more believable than 150,000 dollars. Do not be   surprised if the market goes for max pain, which 
is always going against the tides. When Bitcoin   was above 100K, people really believed in a 200K 
play. That is when the off-guard move catches   everyone. What is up, Fefe? Good to see you, 
bro. Altcoins had a little bit of a red candle   as well. But look at the wick from last week on 
the downside. It is much smaller than the Bitcoin   wick. Altcoins are getting a little bit stronger. 
They are holding downside better than they   previously did. The pullbacks are starting to get 
smaller because there is no one left to shake out.   We broke some key structures and trends. We are 
on hot zones with a higher high in play on the   weekly. Charts are saying altcoins are gaining 
momentum. When they get bullish, they get really   bullish. The key is to buy them now rather than 
six months from now when they are aggressive.   Bitcoin dominance is telling the same story. Look 
at this candle. It closed red and has a big wick   to the downside. High time frame shows we lost 
that big trend. It is very likely this is going   to start dropping aggressively. This aligns with 
Total 3, which is showing a retest and a push to   the upside. Waves to the upside start off slow and 
then increase. The next wave is the hope phase,   and that is the bigger leg up. You can use moving 
averages to look at sentiment and momentum. Put in   a 20 MA and a 50 MA on the daily time frame. These 
moving averages show when momentum is shifting.   You are looking for a cross. When we crossed to 
the upside previously, we rallied from 60,000 to   100,000 dollars. When we crossed to the downside, 
we went from 97,000 down to 80,000. Right now,   the lines are just starting to cross and holding 
support areas. This is not just slightly bullish;   it is a significant shift. Bitcoin is starting to 
show strength. Now let's look at the altcoins. SUI   pumped and made a way higher high. We see 
the cross on SUI. This is what you should be   paying attention to buy on this pullback. SUI 
is the signal. Cardano has not crossed yet. It   is still in a downtrend and is one of the weaker 
coins right now. It does not mean it won't pump,   but it is not the shiniest object yet. I am more 
interested in building SUI bots today. Is there   a cross on ETH? Yes, there is. We are in support 
to buy right now. This is where I need to build my   ETH positions. Solana is very close to the cross. 
It is looking stronger than a lot of altcoins.   Solana will really pump when it breaks the high 
it has not touched since October. 130 to 140 is a   good area to accumulate for the long term. AVAX is 
on the verge of a cross and coming into support.   Chainlink is coming into the test but has not 
crossed fully yet. It is a good area for the long   term, but maybe not the trading token for today. 
Fetch is seeing a golden cross and coming down to   test. Render has been strong and is a great area 
to build on this pullback. Algo has broken out and   is on the verge of a cross. Doge is not mega 
bullish yet but is a good place to accumulate   before the market wakes up. Zcash is losing 
momentum to the downside, so it is not the most   exciting short-term play. Bitcoin is starting to 
show a cross. Large caps like SOL are starting to   break structures. We are not in a full alt season 
yet because smaller coins pump only after money   has already come into the big caps. Bitcoin, ETH, 
and SOL will bring the most liquidity into crypto   first. I am paying attention to blue chips. LIDO 
is showing strength and coming to retest. Gaming   like Illuvium is not strong right now. The 20 MA 
tracks the last 20 days and the 50 MA is a higher   time frame tool. When we start losing the 50 MA, 
that is when we see big changes. The 50 MA is a   powerful tool to tell you when to exit. Right 
now, it is the lowest risk in the market to   enter in the last two years. If you look after 
the downside, the upside will come naturally.   Those with the cojones to get in when things 
are shifting are the ones who get rich. I am   allocating to bots on Pionex right now. 
These are low leverage with stop losses.   On my Bitfunded accounts, I am at 99,300. I am 
waiting for the next opportunity. On the short   time frame for Bitcoin, I do not see us dropping 
much lower than 89,800 before pushing to 94,000.   The market might be crappy for the next 24 to 
48 hours, but look for upside around Wednesday.   I am looking at a short-term relief rally for 
Zcash. It is a 13 percent trade. Bitfunded has   raised the maximum loss and daily loss limits. 
The buy one get one free promotion is running   out today. It is one of the safest ways to trade 
leverage. ETH dominance looks strong. SUI against   Bitcoin is also showing outperformance. Beam 
is a good long-term accumulate but might need   a few weeks for real momentum. Do not miss 
the hope pumps. David, Shane, Devie Diva,   and Roberto, you all get Bitfunded accounts. 
I am fighting with Cryptomanran in a good way   to get crypto live trading started. Have a 
fantastic day. See you tomorrow. Bye-bye.
